ija.homework3.game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • ija.homework3.game.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class implements object Game which includes game board and players.
    Author:
    Norbert Durcansky,Jan Jusko
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • group

        public java.util.ArrayList<Gamer> group
        List of players from which we take each turn one player. This player becomes the leader.

      • board

        public MazeBoard board
        The MazeBoard instance representing game board.

      • leader

        public Gamer leader
        The Gamer instance representing one player, who is the leader.

        Points to win.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static Game create(int players,
          int cards,
          int boardsize,
          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> names)
        Static method create() creates game interface and initialize basic operations for the objects
        Parameters:
        players - is a number of players we want to create
        cards - is a number of cards we want to create
        boardsize - specifies size of the board.
        names - is a string array of names for the current game
        Returns:
        the Game instance Game.

      • Gamerturn

        public void Gamerturn()
        Method will setup the leader of the game.

      • Endturn

        public void Endturn()
        add the leader to the the of the group and setup the new leader

      • initpos

        public void initpos(MazeCard p)
        Initialize the default position of the players
        Parameters:
        p - is a position for the players.

      • pullcard

        public void pullcard()
        Player pulls card from the cardpack if the object on the card is same as the object on the player's field then score is incremented

      • goright

        public void goright()
        Method implements player's move to the right position. If it is not possible than do nothing!

      • goleft

        public void goleft()
        Method implements player's move to the left position. If it is not possible than do nothing!

      • goup

        public void goup()
        Method implements player's move to the up position. If it is not possible than do nothing!

      • godown

        public void godown()
        Method implements player's move to the down position. If it is not possible than do nothing!

      • undo

        public void undo()
